message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $16,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is a fair compromise given the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to counter with an offer of $16,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
